name: Chibi Robo Panic
description:
Created By: Aburd and dustyTokyo

Submission for Mini Jam: 123

Excuse the lack of HTML5 support, godot 4 has some issues with itch.io

Theme

An old abandoned robot with the ability to harness spider-web must escape a factory filled with lava, fire, and other hazards. Can you bring Chibi Web-Robo to safety and escape the factory???

Controls

Keyboard: Move - WASD, Jump - J, Action - K

Keyboard: Move - analog stick or pad, Jump - A, Action - B
